snippet: Compared to David H. Petraeus, Allen Dulles, the C.I.A. director from 1953 to 1961, was far worse: he was a notorious womanizer who was widely known for his extramarital liaisons.
lead_paragraph: Compared to David H. Petraeus, Allen Dulles, the C.I.A. director from 1953 to 1961, was far worse: he was a notorious womanizer who was widely known for his extramarital liaisons.

headline.seo: When a C.I.A. Director Had Scores of Affairs
